Hi All, I'm trying to use content staging but the 'Stage' button doesn't show for me when hovering over the listed pages in the content staging dashboard, I have content staging permissions, any ideas what I'm doing wrong
Hi <@U04538D6PGA> what browser are you working in?
I'm on Mac with Chrome and didn't notice an issue in our accounts, can anyone else on your team test to see if the button shows for them?
Thanks for testing, I assume it's a setup or permissions issue but it's proving difficult to pin down

NP. There's only one setting related to content staging, under Marketing and when it is on, it provides access to all of Content Staging. If you didn't have access, it wouldn't let you even open the tool from the menu.
might be worth checking with HS support
Hello - Has anyone used the NetSuite and HubSpot integration app?
The datasync team built an integration for it: <https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/22358034/marketplace/apps/finance/accounting/netsuite-226318>
Thanks Carter. I modified my question based on this :slightly_smiling_face:
Hi Niraj, I have a client who is a NetSuite SI and uses it. I can ask if they’d be open to connecting if you’d like? Why do you ask?
